fields.Title: Arx - EasterEggs / Modus Mullen / Flow – INITIATING MODUS: MULLEN

fields.Dialogue Text: So I am a dick?
The dicks, gum-heels, hawkshaws, peepers, sleuths -- men like Mullen and you.
So it *was* communism that sent them to the dirt-nap?
This is why you should never read books.
Don't think like a cop, cops don't solve cases. They slide nippers on the goons and take 'em to the big house, but they don't *solve* anything.
This is how I always talk. Move on. The swindle -- cracked it like a discount safe.
Shebang?
The deaths of Charlie Spillane and Deanna Deneuve, the case Dick Mullen was on  -- that's what this crooked swindle must be.
Actually I think I got that one wrong.
Got what?
The coat, the hat, the swindle so crooked a yeggman couldn't break it.
No, I didn't. Whatever it was. [Discard thought.]
The whole shebang.
Yeggman... that's either a safebreaker or someone who works almost exclusively with egg yolks.
I think I've always felt like a private investigator.
A-khm! This cop here solved 216 cases over 18 years.
You're right, he used to be more polite.
So it *was* the crooked copper-chief that iced them after all?
Bullseye. A snooper. And a damn good one.
So the narcomaniac art-lover rubbed them out after all?
That's because you're a dick in cop's clothing. Underneath -- a snooper through and through.
So the killer *was* the highbinder's twat of a son?
Wait, why are you talking like that?
That's it. You got it.
My ledger says I solved 216 cases.
Oh, the coat and the hat?
Who does then?
So Mullen *did* ice his best friend and the broad?
So they *did* love each other to death?
You could've been one of the good ones.
Classic case of Mullen-mania, a well-documented condition.
If there's any doubt, consult your trusty Dick Mullen book and reconnect with the real you, him. Dick Mullen. You. Him. Youse. Modus: Mullen.
I don't feel like a private investigator.
Private investigators are just disrupting police work and endangering civilians. I'm out. [Discard thought.]
